channel.title: Quarry Mining on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Quarry Mining on Universal

item.title: E00477
item.description: Fully refurbished, self contained mobile impact crusher, crusher opening 600x350mm, maximum feed size 200mm, production 100 TPH, 633 hopper, 3 hammers, 90kw electric engine and starter panel, 235/75R17.5 tyres, new paint. Crusher is in good and clean condition.

item.title: E02073
item.description: Remanufactured 2012 Terex BL Kue-Ken 915mm X 610mm (36” x 24”) wheeled jaw crushing plant. Crusher unit fully reconditioned! Capacity up to 180 tph depending on infeed size and product. Electric Drive & switch gear, heavy duty dump hopper, vibrating grizzly section, electric hydraulic power pack, complete new discharge conveyor, complete with new safety rails, ladder and walkways.

item.title: E02138
item.description: Terex-Halco 43-22 crawler drill, Cummins 8.3ltr engine, Onboard compressor, 4mtr drill rods, 6 rods carousel, all pins and bushings on mast are replaced, hoses from drill head to dust collector are replaced, many oil hoses are replaced, all repair pictures are available on request, undercarriage has approx. 90% remaining, 400mm pads. Machine has been workshop tested, repaired, has new paint and is in clean condition.

item.title: E02142
item.description: Unused Portable wheeled screening plant, Metso SH 6x20 3 deck screen, heavy duty Delta manufacturing tandem axle chassis, 1.2 mtr under screen conveyor, full galvinised catwalks on 3 sides, rail mounted chute configuration, 30KW electric drive, chassis mounted control panel with extra switchgear and starters for auxiliary conveyors, up to 800 t/ph capacity. Auxillary stockpilling conveyors from 10 - 18 Mtr. long available at extra cost.

item.title: E02368
item.description: Mobile Kue-Ken 114 jaw crusher, up to 250tph, 42x26 (1100x650) vibrating grizzly feeder, folding discharge conveyor. Caterpillar 3306DI engine, overband magnet, triaxle carrier, 4x hydraulic legs, plant came direct from work and in as is condition. Workshop inspection, repairs, repainting available at extra cost.

item.title: E02604
item.description: Speedstar SS2500/SS40 water drilling rig, mounted on heavy duty oilfield tandem axle trailer with Leveling Jacks, Triple Drum Draw Works, Twin (2) Detroit diesel 471 Deck engines with manual transmission, 18 inch rotary table, 18m hydraulically raised mast, (Mast replaced in 2010), with hook block, swivel, operators control station and console, new 11.00-20 tyres. This drilling rig has new paint, is repaired and is in clean condition. Truck is not included.

item.title: E02937
item.description: 2001 Hausherr Viper H Series crawler drill rig, c/w enclosed operator cabin, suitable for Down The Hole drilling up to 150mm diamater hole, 81kw Caterpillar/Perkins engine, 4.6m drill mast lenght, 40kn pull down force, 40kn withdrawal force, can take 76-95mm rods, 8 rod carousel, rig has gone through the workshop with many components repaired/replaced where applicable. All repair pictures are available upon request. We have a range of mobile diesel air compressors available to suit if necessary.

item.title: E03000
item.description: New manufactured in 2013 Metso SH 6x20 (3 deck) mobile screening plant c/w 3 units brand new XROK Transporter 4030E stockpilling conveyors. Screen size 20ftx6ft (6.00x1.80mtr). Length stockpile conveyor 40ft (12.00 mtr), belt width 30inch (750mm). Capacity up to 800 t/ph. Heavy duty Delta manufacturing tandem axle chassis, 1.2 mtr under screen conveyor, full galvinised catwalks on 3 sides, rail mounted chute configuration. Chassis mounted control panel with extra switchgear and starters for conveyors.

item.title: E03201
item.description: Rebuilt 2014 Terex BL (Brown Lenox) Kue Ken CT1300 (Medium Coarse) modular mounted cone crusher. Cone size 1300mm (51”) , up to 300TPH production. Can take up to 8” (200mm) stone. The cone went through a frame up rebuild, new 160kw electric motor fitted, mounted on new floating frame and sub frame, new manufactured 2 way discharge belt fitted under the cone, new galvanized safety walkways and handrails fitted. Electric starter panel can be supplied at extra cost.

item.title: E03299
item.description: Baxter 900x300mm (36”x12”) Single Toggle Granulator Jaw Crusher, Remanufactured 2013, modular mounted, suitable for secondary crushing after primary jaw crusher, up to 100 TPH capacity depending on infeed and outfeed size, c/w modular base frame, under crusher cross discharge conveyor, electric motor, output size 90-40mm.

item.title: E03453
item.description: Refurbished Kue-Ken 106, 1100x305mm (42x12”) skid mounted modular jaw crusher. New diaphragm, new cheek plates, new keeper plate, new flow switch, new skid mount, new motor stand, new oils and filters. Crusher is in good condition and immediately available. Crusher can be used in a secondary or tertiary application.

item.title: E03672
item.description: New / Rebuilt Svedala Allis H36 wheeled mobile cone crushing plant. Output up to 220 t/ph capacity depending of infeed and outfeed size, c/w completely rebuilt Svedala Allis H36 cone unit. new surge hopper and vibrating feeder, new feed conveyor, new discharge conveyor, new electric motors, drives and control panel, new magnet fitted over feed conveyor, new over cone level sensor connected to an inverter to insure constant feed to the cone.

item.title: E03692
item.description: Refurbished 2018 Metso/Nordberg 1560 (HP500) wheeled mobile cone crushing plant. Cone is set up in secondary configuration, max. feed size 175mm (7”), producing up to 800 TPH, c/w 2 deck Cedarapids 6202 pre- screen. Delta Manufacturing tri axle carrier, control panel and switch gear, rear fines discharge conveyor, side folding product conveyor, unit factory test run and ready to go.

item.title: E03808
item.description: Unused Terex Pegson 1000 modular secondary cone crusher (long throw), c/w base frame, galvanized safety handrails & walkways, 160kW electric motor, lube pack, control unit, over cone hopper, magic eye. All automatic controls located in centralized control cabinet. From 120 -180 TPH capacity depending on feed material and settings. Two way under cone discharge conveyor available at extra cost. Crusher is immediately available!

item.title: E03829
item.description: New & Unused Ingersoll Rand ECM350 towed wagon drill, c/w IR DTH rotary head, can drill 85 mm to 127mm holes and capacity up to 150m deep, set up for down the hole (DTH) rotation drilling, 3,900 Nm Torque @ 8 bar 10,000LB pullback, takes 3m rods, rig weight 5,443 Kg, 300mm Track Shoes, manifold for water injection, safety check valves on main cylinders.** Drill rods, hammers, tooling etc. can be supplied to customers specification at extra cost on request.

item.title: E03976
item.description: New and unused Terex-Cedarapids TSH6163-32 screenbox, 3 deck screen box, mounted on floating sub frame, 16ftx5ft, c/w 30kW electric motor and guards. Screenbox is ready for immediate dispatch! Wide range of quarry equipment / mobile conveyors to suit available from stock!

item.title: E03979
item.description: Parker 105 Kubitizer Primary/Secondary impact crusher, c/w 150KW electric motor, output capacity 175-200 Ton/Hour, feed size 7”-12” (175-350 mm), operating weight 14.000 Kgs. New set of impact hammers in stock which can be supplied at extra cost. Crusher can be painted on request at extra cost.

item.title: E04007
item.description: Pegson 1300 Cone Crusher, Remanufactured 2015, skid mounted, output up to 350t/h capacity depending on infeed and outfeed size, c/w 132kW electric motor, new main frame liners fitted, new shroud covers fitted, new mantle fitted, new distribution plate fitted. Crusher is immediately available from stock. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04336
item.description: Kue-Ken 95 jaw crusher, 915mm X 610mm (36” x 24”) jaw opening. Up to 180 TPH crushing capacity. Internal mechanism repaired/replaced, Crusher has new paint, is fully workshop inspected and repaired. Wide range of crusher/screening equipment available from stock!

item.title: E04405
item.description: Ingersoll Rand CM780D Crawler Rock Drill, Cab with airconditioning, Remanufactured 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C12 engine with 425HP (317kW), automatic rod changer, pull back force 45.530 N, 2-stage rotary screw air compressor, dust collector + pres cyclone, central grease system, rear view camera, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, 350mm pads, all pipes and drill head included, operating weight 21.000 Kgs, CE marked. 3.428 engine hours, 9.809 Drill hours. Machine is workshop tested and is in good and clean condition.

item.title: E04406
item.description: Atlas Copco CM780D Crawler Rock Drill, Cab with airconditioning, Remanufactured 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C13 engine with 445HP (317kW) 0 Hours! Automatic rod changer, pull back force 45.530 N, 2-stage rotary screw air compressor, dust collector + pres cyclone, incl. drill rods, rear view camera, undercarriage on average 75% remaining, 350mm pads, operating weight 22.230 Kgs, CE marked. 6.524 machine hours, 3.424 drill hours. Machine is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04576
item.description: AMS PowerProbe 9635 Geotechnical core drill, drill has only 1014 working hours, PTO powered, 175ft lb hydraulic hammer, high speed auger, high pressure pump, 10’ x 15” drill rod, direct push sampling, side-to-side and in-and-out slide base, hollow stem capabilities, 2-speed 5000 ft lb auger drive head, 80” probe stroke for use of up to 5’ tooling, 2400 psi-12GPM pump, hydraulic oil cooler, 33000 lb push down force, 47500 lb pull back force, adjustable mast for angled probing & drilling.

item.title: E04762
item.description: New & Unused Ingersoll Rand Drilling Package, Ingersoll Rand ECM350 towed wagon drill, c/w IR DTH rotary head, can drill 85 mm to 127mm holes and capacity up to 150m deep, set up for down the hole (DTH) rotation drilling, 3,900 Nm Torque @ 8 bar 10,000LB pullback, takes 3.1mtr rods, rig weight 5,443 Kg, 300mm track shoes, manifold for water injection, safety check valves on main cylinders, Unused Doosan/Ingersoll-Rand SHP650 High Capacity Portable Air Compressor, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cummins 6CTA8.

item.title: E04799
item.description: New & unused Xrok Transporter 6036T Mobile tracked stockpiling conveyor belt, powered by Caterpillar C2.2 engine with 49HP (36kW), 18 Mtr length, belt width 900mm, EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, remote greasing, hydraulic cylinders for raise and lower, CE marked. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Machines are available for sale or rent.

item.title: E04874
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 4030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 40ft (12mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: E04953
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 5030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 50ft (15mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: E04954
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 6030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 60ft (18mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: E04955
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 8030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 80ft (24mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: E04964
item.description: New and unused Xrok Rotator 380 Recycling Screen available in a tracked or wheeled configuration. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Machine is available for sale or rent. Inspections are welcome. Demonstration available. For more info please call +31 888 966 966 or email us at: sales@deltamachinery.nl You can also visit the XROK website: www.xrok.com

item.title: E04966
item.description: Xrok Transporter 5036T Mobile tracked stockpiling conveyor belt, powered by Caterpillar C2.2 engine with 49HP (36kW), 15 Mtr length, belt width 900mm, EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, remote greasing, hydraulic cylinders for raise and lower, undercarriage 75% remaining, 400mm pads, CE marked. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Inspections are welcome. New Xrok stockpiling conveyor belts available from stock!

item.title: K01718
item.description: Unused factory built 14m x 900mm mobile feed conveyor complete with intergrated feed hopper. c/w single axle trailer. Suitable for feeding cone crusher or screen plant. Belt discharge height in working position 6.75 Mtr, Hopper length 4.0 Mtr, Hopper width 1.9 Mtr.

item.title: K03084
item.description: Brand new and unused Terex-Pegson flywheel to suit 11650⁄11800 crusher, outside diameter 1270mm, inside diameter 190mm, width 405mm, 1x grove + 1x smooth flywheel.

item.description: Brand new and unused Terex-Pegson flywheel to suit 11650⁄11800 crusher, outside diameter 1270mm, inside diameter 190mm, width 405mm, 1x grove + 1x smooth flywheel.

item.description: Terex-Pegson Trakpactor 428⁄320 hammer, part number 6984⁄79. Several pieces available from stock!

item.description: Mantle to suit Metso LT200 / HP200 cone (18% Chrome, 2% Manganese) . Metso Part No 1050130813

item.description: Set of 4pcs new & unused high chrome blow bars to suit Terex-Pegson 1412 / XA500 Trakpactor crusher.

item.title: K03580
item.description: Set of 4pcs new & unused high chrome blow bars to suit Terex-Pegson 1412 / XA500 Trakpactor crusher.

item.title: K03620
item.description: New manufactured subframe structure for large Jaw Crusher (up to 1200x800 size) including rock box, flywheel guards, safety walkways, laders and handrails, 132kw electric motor complete with adjustment bracket.

item.title: K03620
item.description: New manufactured subframe structure for large Jaw Crusher (up to 1200x800 size) including rock box, flywheel guards, safety walkways, laders and handrails, 132kw electric motor complete with adjustment bracket.

item.title: K03773
item.description: New Metso swing jaw plate to suit Nordberg-Metso C106 crusher.

item.title: K04095
item.description: New manufactured Finlay 14x5 double deck screenbox. Screensize 14ft x 5ft (4.25mtr x 1.5mtr). c/w 15kW electric motor, meshes fitted on top and bottom screen deck., screen is mounted on a modular subframe structure. Walkways fitted on both sides. Can screen up to 400tph. Chutes, Conveyors, etc. can be supplied at extra cost on request.

item.title: K04398
item.description: Used Sandvik (Svedala) heavy duty vibrating grizzly feeder, 4.2m x 1.1m (14ft x 42”), c/w 2 section step grizzly, invicta electic motors (2), springs. Unit can be supplied with subframe / hopper etc at extra cost if required.

item.title: K04398
item.description: Used Sandvik (Svedala) heavy duty vibrating grizzly feeder, 4.2m x 1.1m (14ft x 42”), c/w 2 section step grizzly, invicta electic motors (2), springs. Unit can be supplied with subframe / hopper etc at extra cost if required.

item.title: K04443
item.description: XROK 205S-2 static 2 deck scalping/finishing screen. Screen size 20ft x 5ft (6m x 1.5m). c/w 15kW electric motor (not shown on pictures). Meshes fitted on top and bottom screen deck. Screen is mounted on a heavy duty frame. Can screen up to 600tph in scalping configuration, up to 400tph in final screening configuration. Chutes, Sub frames, Conveyors, etc. can be supplied at extra cost on request.

item.title: K04543
item.description: New Metso fixed jaw plate to suit Nordberg-Metso C105 crusher. Part number 928918

item.title: K04544
item.description: New Metso fixed jaw plate to suit Nordberg-Metso C105 crusher. Part number 928918
